data.message:
So let me get this straight...   a video of a couple of kids dousing a small dog in gasoline and lighting it on fire.... with the video continuing to show the dog agonize in pain DOESN'T violate your company's "Community Standards"?  Get some real people on those reports...  and not robots.

I know it's an enormous job to police that kind of stuff... but if that passes a review then I can't even begin to imagine what doesn't.

replies.message: Someone needs to report those kids to the authorities.
Yeah.  It ruined my day seeing that. I hope they were severely punished
